name: PLOG
description:
The universe has sprung a serious leak.

Oddly shaped black holes are appearing across our galaxy. Worlds are being consumed.

You must align your containment field to PLOG these cosmic breaches.

Instructions
-Use left/right arrow or A/D keys to align outline with shape.
-Align shapes to score points. Perfect alignment increases scoring potential.
-Failing to align before collision will cost you 1 life point. Lose them all and the game is over.

Match 20 unique shapes across 3 difficulty levels!

Other
-Xbox360 GamePad also supported.

Game by:
Jerry Verhoeven https://twitter.com/JerryVerhoeven
Ben Kerslake https://twitter.com/benjkers

Made for Ludum Dare 26 - "Minimalism"
